consent: Asking for consent by clearly disclosing what the consent is being given to and how the data will be used.

return_policy.title: Return policy

delivery.title: Delivery
delivery.track_progress: Track the progress of your order in real time
delivery.money-back: 30 day money-back returns if you change your mind

billing.missing_address: You need to select or add a billing address

payment-error.title: Payment declined

thank_you.email_sent: We sent an email to address
thank_you.del_address: Your order is on going at delivery address:
thank_you.track_through_email: If you want to track your order you can do it by following the instructions we sent you by email.

bank.details: The order will be shipped only after confirmation of receipt by bank transfer. To make the bank transfer, please use the following data:
bank.note: It is very important that you mention the above reference in the description of the bank transfer!
